level.heading: Subordination to canon law or other religious doctrine.
level.text: If religious doctrine or canon law governing the affairs of a religious corporation is inconsistent with this chapter on the same subject, the religious doctrine or canon law shall control to the extent required by the Constitution of the United States.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.
